pageContext.claim: “We have car companies coming in from Japan, brand-new plants going to be announced soon. They've already announced some of them. Going to Michigan, and Ohio, and Pennsylvania, and Kentucky, and North Carolina, and South Carolina. Coming all over our country. Florida.”
pageContext.analysis: Weeks before the midterm elections, Trump said brand-new car plants would be announced soon in all these states, most of which have competitive races. There's no evidence Japanese companies are planning these moves, although other companies have announced plans to expand car production in Michigan.
